title: What is this font?
content:
anyone know the font name? thanks millions!

p.s. the website:

[http://www.eastmancommons.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090902182014/http:/www.eastmancommons.com/ "http://www.eastmancommons.com/")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ECC.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090902182014/http:/typophile.com/files/ECC.jpg) | 14.17 KB |
| [east.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20090902182014/http:/typophile.com/files/east.png) | 20.59 KB |
author: RJClouse

comments.content: It’s rather small to see for sure, but [Univers Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20090902182014/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/univers/?testdrive=custom%3D0%26seed%3D21%26dock%3D0%26size%3D57%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DEastman%2520Commons%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dsingle%252Cot.liga) would be my guess.
I’ll have to agree with Mark. Especially since I know several of the designers in Rochester. The faculty at RIT use it quite a bit.
